source.65660359:
article_count = {}
for entry in file_data["eminescu_publishing"]:
    publication_year = entry['date_published'][-4:]
    # fix bad values within the dataset
    if publication_year == "1816":
        publication_year = "1876"
        entry['date_published'] = "31 octombrie 1816"
    elif publication_year == "1981":
        publication_year = "1881"
        entry['date_published'] = "9 august 1881" 
        
    if publication_year in article_count.keys():
        # Increase publication count
        article_count[publication_year] += 1
    else:
        # Add year to the article_count hash
        article_count[publication_year] = 1

article_count_chronologically = sorted(article_count.items())      
f, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(18,5))
plt.bar(*zip(*article_count_chronologically), color='g')
ax.set_title("Eminescu publications per year")
plt.show()
print(article_count_chronologically)

from nltk.corpus import stopwords
from wordcloud import WordCloud, ImageColorGenerator

# Get a list of all words from the dataset
all_eminescu_words = " ".join(token['article_text'] for token in file_data["eminescu_publishing"])
wordcloud = WordCloud(stopwords=stopwords_ro,
                      max_words=1500,
                      max_font_size=350, random_state=42,
                      width=2000, height=1000, colormap = "twilight")
wordcloud.generate(all_eminescu_words)

# Plot

plt.imshow(wordcloud, interpolation='bilinear')
plt.axis("off")
plt.show()

source.6ccd7793:
✔️ As we can see, 1881 was the most prolific year for Eminescu, when he singlehandedly wrote no less than 378 documented publications! But he has also written a lot of poetry that year: * Mănușa (The Glove) * Scrisoarea I (The First Letter) * Scrisoarea II (The Second Letter) * Scrisoarea III (The Third Letter) * Scrisoarea IV (The Fourth Letter) * Scrisoarea V (The Fifth Letter) * Sarmis * Gemenii (The Twins) * Gelozie (Jealousy) * Din când în când... (From Time to Time ...) * Ca și Stoa, ce pretinde... (As Stoa pretends ..) * Doña Sol * De-ar fi mijloace (If there would be means) * În zădar în colbul școlii... (In vain in the school's dust ...) This is just amazing. What are we doing with our free time ?
📜 Note: We can also observe a steep decrease of publications in 1883. This is consistent with the fact that during 28th of June, 1883, Mihai Eminescu, the leader of *Timpul* (The Time) journal, was arrested at 33 years and then forced into a sanatorium. He became the first romanian journalist turned into a political prisoner, as he was writing against the regime, exposing much of the political corruption that was happening at the time.

📜 As one can observe, the Principality of Transylvania, was a realm of the Hungarian Crown ruled by the Habsburg and Habsburg-Lorraine monarchs. The Romanians representing the majority of the population, the Habsburgs have conducted a agressive campaign for changing the culture in Transylvania. They would also propose unequal laws that benefited the magyar minority population. Eminescu goes at legnth about their issues in this and other publications.

source.c77e337d:
📜

Beyond his creative poetical genius, Eminescu had a rationalist mind as well. He was very much preoccupied with the rights and liberties of the Romanian citizens, as well as with the preservation and the continuous enrichment of the Romanian culture. He hated, above all, political upstartism and corruption. 


📜

There are many articles written against the policies adopted by the liberal party ("rosii" e.g. "the reds") and their leaders, Ion I.C. Bratianu and C.A. Rosetti. Well versed in rhetorical and logical fallacies, Mihai Eminescu wrote a lot of publications against the "Romanul" ("The Romanian") liberal journal, uncovering their fake news campaigns.

source.b812aadf: ✔️ The longest publication treats the matter of **usury**, the practice of making unethical or immoral monetary loans that unfairly enrich the lender. As this fenomenon was not regulated by the legal system during that period, Eminescu wrote at length about the disastruous implications of this legislative flaw to the national economy. His articles proved instrumental in taking the first legal steps to mittigate this issue.
